page_content: The page provides various studies and reports related to regional planning and development.
The page reports on an incident involving a 7-year-old girl and a man, which was later found to be a misunderstanding.
The page provides FAQs about the IT Education Initiative, focusing on digital competencies for teachers.
The page provides information on work and rest time regulations, including how to apply for work time permits.
The page provides answers to frequently asked questions about land registry and property transfer procedures.
The page provides information on tax regulations for corporations, including Gewinnsteuer and Kapitalsteuer.
The page discusses the St.Galler Kindesschutz-Konferenz, which focuses on the protection of vulnerable and abused children and adolescents.
